column4: how do you automount a drive? I have an 80gb and a 30gb partition i would like to auto-mount any ideas how>
If they are on a fixed disk you'll need to add entries to /etc/fstab describing them, and a directory to mount them on (usually in /media/ or /mnt/)
If they are removable devices (hot plug or USB) then gnome-mount should detect and mount them when connected, unless that option is turned off
